{"id":497899404,"lang":"java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1621917014,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/497899404/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"39.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n       int length = nums.length;\n        int sum = 0;\n        int leftSum = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<length; i++) {\n            sum+=nums[i];\n        }\n        for (int j=0; j<length; j++) {\n            if (leftSum == sum-leftSum-nums[j]) {\n                return j;\n            }\n            leftSum += nums[j];\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
